body:
Greetings to all players, members, and staff of the Avicus!
In this discussion, I will take the chance to introduce myself to you!
My real name is Athena Su Dimou.
I am 13 years old.
I was born in August 11, 2003.
My nationality is quite an interesting mix.
Believe it or not, I am half-Korean and half-Greek.

I know how to speak Korean, Greek, English, Chinese, and a bit of Finnish and Maori.
If you are wondering why I speak so many languages at my age, I will explain it to you.
Since birth, I have traveled a lot!
Here is a brief history:

I have lived in:
China for 5 years
Korea for 1 1/2 years
Greece for 3 months
America for 4 years
Thailand for 1 week
Fiji for 2 months
New Zealand for 1 1/2 years
Tonga for 2 months

So as you can see...I have proven my point! :)
I hope all of you and I get along together and have a GREAT time!
Thanks to all the staff and Avicus!
I'll see you guys soon!
Bye!
Best Regards to All,


Athena Su Dimou

Thank you! Thank you! Thank you!
I really really appreciate all your welcomes!
It is such a good beginning to hear from all of you!
Avicus, you have gave me a GREAT beginning, I, in return will respect, have a great time, and give you all I can! Thank you Avicus!
You are the only minecraft server I trust!
I will vote EVERY single day! I promise!
Thank you so much!

replies.body:
Hello Zeusy, Spoookeh, Orbb_, ImRaging, 4Lextr, and _Joules!
Thank you for reminding me!
That time, I was a bit absent-minded..I admit to the charges against me.

But I have learned my lesson, and I would like to have a fresh start with Avicus!
I'll make sure to read the rules! Thank you so much!
I appreciate all of your comments!
Hope to see you all in game!
Have a great evening!

-Athena Su Dimou-
